review: I absolutely love it!  I can catch up on many TV shows like Justified and The Americans without paying anything extra.  Movie selection is pretty good.  I love accessing my Netflix as well.  I highly recommend it for anyone who is a fan of a series show or movie buff.  The music playlists are very diverse.  We enjoy them on weekends.
